title: Implement Agent Memory Persistence
description: Develop a persistent memory system for agents to maintain knowledge across sessions
technical_challenges: Efficient retrieval algorithms with context awareness
Pruning algorithms that preserve critical information

subtasks.title: Design memory storage schema
technical_challenges: Designing flexible schema for various memory types
Optimizing for both storage and retrieval performance

subtasks.title: Develop hierarchical memory organization
technical_challenges: Building memory graph without circular references

subtasks.title: Build relevance scoring system
technical_challenges: Algorithm development for various relevance factors
Balancing recency vs. importance vs. context relevance
